item.title: Live updates: Trump picks South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem as homeland security secretary
item.description: Get the latest news on the transition to the new administration of President-elect Donald Trump and a new Congress.

item.title: Donald Trump’s expected nomination of Marco Rubio to be secretary of state is getting early support...
2024 turnout is near the 2020 record. See how each state compares.
item.description: Votes are still being counted in some states, but those tabulated so far and expected totals show a range of turnout across states.

item.title: Trump picks Gov. Kristi Noem to serve as homeland security secretary
item.description: The DHS secretary is key to Trump’s domestic policy agenda. He pledged mass deportations of undocumented immigrants and a crackdown at the U.S.-Mexico...

item.title: Discord leaker Jack Teixeira awaits sentence for sharing U.S. secrets
item.description: The Discord leaks rocked the U.S. national security establishment, revealing the speed with which top-secret materials can spread online.
